jslint.enable.description: Control whether or not jslint is enabled for JavaScript files.

jslint.version.description: Select the one of node-jslint's installed versions that you want to use.

jslint.config.description: A path to file containing the configuration options for jslint. If the file exists it overrides jslint.options and any .jslintrc file

jslint.options.description: The jslint options object to provide args to the jslint command.

jslint.excludePath.description: A path to a file containing patterns describing which files and directories should be ignored by jslint. If the file exists it overrides jslint.exclude and any .jslintignore file.

jslint.exclude.description: Matching files and directories are being ignored by jslint. Glob patterns are interpreted relative to the workspace's root folder.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd ../jslint-server && npm run compile && cd ../jslint && tsc -p ./
